website_summaries.verdict: A biodegradable toothbrush that gets the job done, but it's not as well made as the others.
pros: Small brush head to help reach the backs of your molars
cons: The handle and bristles are not as soft and smooth as the others listed here

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to the highest degree
customer_reviews.text: This product was for my teenage daughter and this is what she told me to tell you: "After many desperate hours of research, I came across these little numbers. They are everything I would ever hope for in a toothbrush. They have a very nice and smooth mouth-feel, unlike traditional toothbrushes (which have the tendency to feel like pine needles). The texture of the handle is also magnificent. I found it very nice that it came with four toothbrushes. That is essentially a years worth. In fact, it would have lasted a year for me, had my parents not stolen them for themselves, after my constant boasting of their quality.
customer_reviews.author: mk35

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are so clean! One use, and I relegated my Oral B fancy-bristled plastic thing to the housekeeping brushes bin. I like extra-soft bristles, but I like these, even though I'd rank them as "soft". I think they have the effect of extra-soft bristles because of their tapered lengths: they're not cut blunt. A huge plus is how small the brushes and heads are! I didn't know that tricked-out conventional toothbrushes are too big for my mouth. I didn't need longer bristles: I needed a smaller toothbrush head! My molars are so happy and smooth. These brushes feel great in my hand, they fit in my cabinet, and I feel good about keeping extras for guests. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pray

customer_reviews.title: soft, but sharp, feels like a twig in your hands.
customer_reviews.text: Nice super soft bristles. I like it, but it's not perfect. I noticed that the bristles may not have been polished as the first use I got stabbed in the gums by them, they were sharp. Also a few bristles have shed. The last thing I noticed was that it feels like, well, a twig in your hand. I found that by running the whole brush and handle in water this wasn't an issue. Might just be me, but it solved the problem. I like it, and have a whole set of brushes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: First reaction from opening was omg they're tiny! But then once I started brushing, realized it's the perfect size, the bristles are slightly harder than most bamboo brushes, which I also love. The body of the brush feels really thin, but it's surprisingly strong. I loved the fact that the company sent me emails asking if I received them, if they were ok, and to see if they were what I expected. Loved the communication, the packaging, and I can rest at night knowing we're making a difference by not using plastic.
customer_reviews.author: VogUeDFK

customer_reviews.title: I feel good about using a biodegradable product
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about using a biodegradable product, and I like this toothbrush. The head of the toothbrush is small, so it reaches the back molars easily. This toothbrush is not angled. I will have to get an angled toothbrush to compare the designs. The bristles seem to clean well. The only way I can tell is the smooth feeling where plague tends to build up the most, right behind my bottom front teeth. After brushing my teeth they do seem to be brighter. I will update my review after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Evets

customer_reviews.title: They seem to last forever!!!! I LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tooth brushes I have ever used and they last SO long!!! They rinse clean and the bristles are soft, but they seem to scrub and polish my teeth really well. To top of their high quality and longevity, they are biodegradable and no chemicals or plastics going into your mouth; which is SO important to my family and I. All tooth brushes should be made like these are. I highly recommend these brushes. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Girl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my charcoal toothpaste though I wouldn't recommend it as an everyday toothbrush. I'm used to my sonicare so the head feels odd and the wood tastes strange in your mouth however, the bristles are soft and the toothbrush is lightweight. The entire toothbrush (handle and bristles), faded after a while but I'm guessing that it's to be expected from a biodegradable product such as this. All in all, not a bad buy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Great Toothbrush! I love the size as it is easy to reach all around my mouth, especially the back hard to reach areas. The bristles are soft, but not too soft and leave my teeth feeling squeaky clean. My last brush left food in a problem spot I have but that is a thing of the past. I actually bought these toothbrushes to use with 'black' charcoal toothpaste but find they work just as well by itself, often with just a little coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda J

customer_reviews.title: I like the sustainability of bamboo
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I like the sustainability of bamboo. These toothbrushes are one of the best uses yet that I have seen. I have started to pay attention to the amount of plastic I throw away and it bothers me. These claim to be biodegradable and it sure seems like they will do just that. They are also nice toothbrushes. The bristles are the right softness for me. Time will tell how long they are effective toothbrushes but after a week of use I like them as tooth brushes and feel good about the fact I can throw them away with less guilt.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smart

customer_reviews.title: most >> wonderful product whose makers are doing wonderful things for us ...
customer_reviews.text: ..least >> bristles not firm enough..it's a personal preference, i know, but most bamboo toothbrushes tend to have super-soft bristles.. ..most >> wonderful product whose makers are doing wonderful things for us & the planet..the tranquilo / White Smile toothbrushes are especially nice in that they have smaller heads..some other bamboo makers have overly large ones that are awkward to use..
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've tried these toothbrushes, I just can't see myself going back to the ones I used to use from the drug store. These are the softest bristles I've had on my teeth in a while. The charcoal is great because your teeth get REALLY bright white and clean. It also helps to keep my breath fresher for longer after brushing. I couldn't have imagined these toothbrushes working as well as they do, but I'm a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Bye Felicia

customer_reviews.title: The handles are good
customer_reviews.text: The handles for this toothbrush are very nice. I like them better then several of the other bamboo brushes I've used. But! The bristles are not compostable even though the box says they r. Also the packaging has plastic laminate on it so it is also not compostable. It might be recycable, if u have that sort of program near you. It would be better if the box was just cardbourd.
customer_reviews.author: Mezz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrushes! The handle and neck of the brush are smooth and comfortable to hold. The bristles and soft in stiffness but a little sharper than traditional plastic brushes and require getting used to and some adjustment on pressure used while brushing. Teeth felt very clean after the first use. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Galidah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: There are fantastic, I've had no issues with bristles coming lose, they last as long as expensive plastic ones and after I use them to mark the names of the plants in my garden. My 11 year old son uses them too and is much more eager to brush his teeth and 'help the environment' than he was to stick a piece of plastic in his little mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Lokmom

customer_reviews.title: Pass for me
customer_reviews.text: I probably.. wouldn't buy it again. It feels good to know I'm using a product that's more sustainable, but after 2 months of use I have come to the conclusion that the discomfort that brushing brings, I need to find another bamboo toothbrush as an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha G.

customer_reviews.title: Been using these toothbrushes for a bit now and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using these toothbrushes for a bit now and I certainly won't go back to buying plastic again. They are very light in hand and dry very quickly. The bristles are a little bit sharp at first, but I quickly got used to it. Using a bit lighter hand while brushing. Went to the dentist yesterday and all 3 people who worked on my teeth cleaning complimented me on how lovely my teeth were.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them in August but just got to use it today. I regretted very much for not giving it a try earlier while I could still return them, the quality is horrible. The bristles fall off and get stuck on my tongue, in between teeth, almost swollen a few. Gees, this is not even good for cleaning because it is going to make more mess with fallen bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Yona park

customer_reviews.title: These are an amazing alternative to traditional wasteful toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing alternative to traditional wasteful toothbrushes. One toothbrush lasted me a few months (you're supposed to change to a new one after then anyway) and the bristles stayed in tact. Only drawback is that the bamboo can become discolored and almost mildew from constant exposure to water.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kunselman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I've only been using it for five ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've only been using it for five days and have already noticed my teeth getting whiter. The bristles are soft but long and my gums were sensitive to it at first, but now they're fine. My only suggestion would be to rinse them well before using the first time. This is my first wooden toothbrush and the feel of it in my mouth is still something I'm getting used to, but it's definitely not a deal breaker with the results I'm getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best toothbrushes I've purchased - the softest bristles and nice lightweight design. Definitely going to reorder these again! My husband and I both really like these over any plastic-made toothbrush. We love that it's biodegradable!
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 def recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these already. I enjoy how lightweight they are and the bristles are perfectly soft. I did notice they are faded already at the edges of the bristles after just a couple days but that doesnt bother me or affect my opinion. I love these and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra A

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these toothbrushes. I like the shape and size of the brush head (it's petite, which is great for brushing the back of your teeth). However, after a week of use, this toothbrush started to hurt my gums. The bristles felt soft to the touch, but not to my gums. If you have sensitive gums, this probably isn't the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: alli

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Bristles fall out, 3-5 per brushing. Maybe you open a new one once the bristles are gone? I've tried several other brands, none have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Smm304

customer_reviews.title: Usually I hate soft bristles
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the toothbrushes arrive on time, the packaging was eco-friendly. Usually I hate soft bristles, but these toothbrushes really do get your teeth clean without irritating your gums. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: April C.

customer_reviews.title: New Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the eco friendly aspect of this product. The bristles are soft; which makes it great for even the youngest family members. Recommending to everyone I can! Also, I really appreciate the company contacting me as well to make sure I was completely satisfied. Hope they keep up the excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for charcoal teeth cleanser
customer_reviews.text: These toothbrushes are great to use with my charcoal teeth whitening cleaner. The bristles are soft and the charcoal washes off the wood easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy

customer_reviews.title: Earth friendly= love
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this quickly and Switched out our tooth brushes right away. These are very soft which is best. They also have nice bristle ends so that you can clean your teeth well but also gently. I use one one my 17 month old (gently) and also for my husband. He does it himself though :D. I gave one away as a gift. I love the idea of them being earth friendly.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: ... feels very light in my hand and its very easy to get to difficult spots with it
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush feels very light in my hand and its very easy to get to difficult spots with it, specially in the back of my mouth. After brushing, my teeth feel cleaner than before (when I used plastic toothbrush). I think my Biodegradable toothbrush cleans better because the row of bristles is thin allowing it to reach more difficult places. But the best feeling is knowing that I'm not using plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Herrera

customer_reviews.title: These are nice toothbrushes, but they are a little small
customer_reviews.text: These are nice toothbrushes, but they are a little small. They get the job done though, and I feel good that I am using less plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these toothbrushes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these toothbrushes, but I didn't. The size was okay, but the bristles scratched my teeth and gums. I used it for about a week before I had to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: They love them. And so do I
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an alternative to plastic toothbrushes, specifically for my 5 year old and 2 year old. They love them. And so do I. The bristles are close enough together that I feel like the kids little teeth are getting a good clean. Will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: TaraZ

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for coming up with these.  Just love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They make my teeth feel really clean and such an improvement on any other toothbrush I have ever used. Use it with my own recipe for toothpaste and my teeth are looking so much better already. Thank you for coming up with these.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: These work even better than expected. They are better than my sonic toothbrush. My teeth are cleaner and less sensitive. I've been buying these for about a year now and will continue to do so. My dentist is very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for me the best toothbrushes so far
customer_reviews.text: Soft, small head, lightweight, for me the best toothbrushes so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic alternative to plastic tooth brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have used them for about 3 weeks now. It isn't fancy and its just a basic toothbrush, however, it works just fine and gets the job done. Bonus, no plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product. good price. sustainable.
customer_reviews.text: head of the toothbrush is a little small but they're nice and use less materials than others adding to their sustainability. overall satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Tooth brush does a great job reaches all the corners my only complaint is that it is small i wish it was a little bigger. Other than that it's a good Tooth brush

customer_reviews.title: It works just as well as any other toothbrush but ...
customer_reviews.text: It works just as well as any other toothbrush but the bristles are a little tough for me. I use extra soft toothbrushes so I may have to look into other bamboo toothbrushes that have softer bristles.

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrushes, and eco-friendly too! Soft bristles that are gentle on the gums, yet firm enough to hold up. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: These are great! My teeth feel nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My teeth feel nice and clean. The bristles are a different feeling than traditional tooth brush but it feels great. My 8 year old son loves them as well.

customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrushes. The handle is nice (I've tried other bamboo toothbrushes that were weirdly large and bulky) and the bristles feel great while brushing. I also love that there was no-to-minimal plastic involved in the shipping.

product_meta.title: Biodegradable Toothbrush, Family Pack of 4 All Natural Bamboo Handle & Charcoal Infused Nylon 4 Bristles - Vegan Friendly (Nylon)
product_meta.description:
The Problem 
Every year 1 billion toothbrushes are used, just in the US. That’s 50 million pounds of plastic trash that’s dumped into landfills. 80% of that plastic ends up in our oceans. If each toothbrush takes 300 years to decompose, that makes 15 billion years to biodegrade. That’s a serious problem. 

The Solution
Use the White Smile all natural bamboo handle toothbrush with natural charcoal bristles. The bristles are soft, and naturally antibacterial. The handle is made of a smooth moso bamboo that will be gone in months after you stop using it, instead of centuries. 

Features 
Free of BPA Plastics which have been known to cause brain memory loss, retardation in unborn babies, diabetes, asthma, and male impotence. 
Soft charcoal bristles made of naturally activated charcoal.

These eco friendly toothbrushes will decompose quickly (under two years, as opposed to 300 years), while also providing your family with a high quality product. Safe, reliable, dentist recommended.

We Give To The Ocean Cleanup Project: Our mission is to build the best possible products using natural materials that will degrade quickly after useful life, help eliminate the needless consumption of disposable plastic products, while also contributing to the clean up of our oceans.
